song_name: It Won't Be Like This For Long
lyrics:
10 contributorsit wonâ€™t be like this for long lyricsverse 1
he didnt have to wake up
hed been up all night
lying there in bed listening
to his new born baby cry
he makes a pot of coffee
he splashes water on his face
his wife gives him a kiss and says
it is going to be ok

chorus
it wont be like this for long
one day well look back laughing
at the week we brought her home
this phase is going to fly by
so baby just hold on
it wont be like this for long

verse 2
four years later bout four thirty
shes crawling in their bed
and when he drops her off at preschool
shes clinging to his leg
the teacher peels her off of him
he says what can i do
she says now do not you worry
this will only last a week or two
see darius rucker liveget tickets as low as 69you might also likechorus
it wont be like this for long
one day soon youll drop her off
and she wont even know youre gone
this phase is going to fly by
if you could just hold on
it wont be like this for long

verse 3
someday soon shell be a teenager
and at times hell think she hates him
then hell walk her down the aisle
and hell raise her veil
but right now she up and crying
and the truth is that he dont mind
as he kisses her good night
and she says her prayers
he lays down there beside her
till her eyes are finally closed
and just watching her it breaks his heart
cause he already knows

chorus
it wont be like this for long
one day soon that little girl is going to be
all grown up and gone
yeah this phase is going to fly by
he is trying to hold on
it wont be like this for long
it wont be like this for long4embed
